meta.title: What did I learn this week (2021) - 34
meta.description: Weekly summarization and review of things I've learned in the third week of August 2021

pageProps.content:
• Found an informative post about react rendering.
  • Found a long and helpful article on performance improvements in dotnet6.
  • Project Hug - Google quietly paid game developers hundreds of millions of dollars in incentives to keep their games on the Play Store, a newly unredacted complaint from Epic Games in its antitrust suit against Google alleges. The program was known as “Project Hug,” or later as the “Apps and Games Velocity Program.”
  • Kei car, known variously outside Japan as Japanese city car, ultramini, or Japanese microcar, is the Japanese vehicle category for the smallest highway-legal passenger cars
